Half Life 2 has a lot of hype, whether it deserves it I’m not sure as I can only review it after playing it in Feb 2016 not 5 years earlier when it was released. I have completed this game in about 13 hours at a generally leisurely pace.

The story line keeps your attention if not a little repetitive and predictable. Basically escape here and get to there. The maps are quite easy to navigate; there is a lot of solving basic puzzles to navigate through. One side of map press button turn lever, other side of map door opens ect. I had to use the walk through on about 3 occasions to work out what I was meant to do.  After watching it I did think there was no way I would have worked it out in a million years. I found the ending to be the best part of the game, the last 30 minutes of gameplay where possibly the best written on any game I’ve played.

The graphics hold their own for an old game, and it used between 1 and 11% OF THE GTX 980 which you’d expect. (on the highest settings). I believe this would run on almost anything.

If you liked the original Half Life then this is a must get, otherwise buy it on sale. Arguably it is a game that all PC gamers should have played. 

Half Life 2 a good way to spend 13 hours or less.

Being a console gamer until very recently, I had never played any of the Half-Life games before. I did, however, constantly hear the "Half-Life 3 Confirmed" meme. I had sensed how beloved this series is to PC gamers, and having recently built my first gaming PC, I just now got to see what all the buzz is about. I see the appeal! This game has aged amazingly... I think of other games from 2004, and they all look like s**t compared to HL2. Both graphically and gameplay-wise, this game was clearly ahead of its time. Playing on ultra settings, there were quite a few times where I saw something and thought to myself "This was made in 2004?" And the physics-based gameplay was just really impressive as well. The campaign was also surprisingly lengthy; Still fairly short, but much longer than modern FPS campaigns that you'd get with say COD or Halo.

Cons? Hmmmm... there were a few too many "defend this area for X amount of time" segments for my liking. I was also annoyed by the "shoot down these aircraft with all this rocket launcher ammo scattered about" segments. Also, the ending was very anti-climactic. It ends abruptly without any boss battle or any real challenging segment. Other than that, not many negatives to consider. And those are rather petty issues at that.

If you haven't experienced the good time that is HL2 yet, do yourself a favor and buy this game.

9/10

Half Life 2-очень революционная игра, показывающая своим существованием, какими большими шагами может продвигаться игровая индустрия. Что же нас ждет в этой игре? Давайте разберем.
Игра имеет замечательный сюжет, хорошо проработанную и интересную историю. Она проходится на одном дыхании. Скучать вам не прийдется на протяжении игры: геймплей тут очень разнообразный. Мы будем кататься на багги, амфибии, управлять армией муравьиных львов, убивать солдат "Альянса" гигантским краном- в общем, заняться есть чем. В игре по-настоящему правильная физика, которая местами лучше, чем в играх 2015-2016 года. На момент выхода (2004 год) игра имела потрясающую картинку. В Half Life 2 шикарная атмосфера, местами игра пытается быть хоррором, а именно в главе "Мы не ходим в Рейвенхолм" и еще в парочке моментов. И это ей здорово удается. Фанаты первой части, несомненно, уже давно прошли игру, а если нет- идите играть не раздумывая, игра вас не разочарует.
[h1] Вердикт
Несомненно, классика жанра, эталонный шутер, в свое время поразивший всех, как и первая часть.
10 из 10[/h1]

This was interestingly enough one of the best games that has come to inhabit the FPS gaming spectrum. However, since playing it 12 years later for the first time since it's introduction into gaming, it doesn't quite stand out as something particulary interesting or fascinating as many other people have suggested. As the protagonist, you are kept running around places to help the cause to free humanity from the Combine, however, none of the plot is progressed or explained. Instead, in the end, we get some random guy who comes to you without any knowledge or clues as to who he is.

Well...The graphics are pretty good for a game that was made in 2004. And the updated has even better graphics. The story line,Characters and their storyline,Our storyline are all good, So in this game you are playing as Gordan Freeman a scentist from Black Mesa Facality. He made a test but failed and got all Xen Monsters to the real world (Xen is another dimension full of ohter creatures...Most are dangerous) So as gordan tries to escape by finding weapons from people who died. He later on met a mysterious character reffered to (Gman) Some say he is god while ohters say he is A goverment. But who knows. So Gordan meets this character and this character wants Gordan to be his (Employee) Oh and here is some information about him (Gman is neither a bad or good character. Sometimes he helps you while ohetr times he makes it harder for you he is a mysterious character and no one actually knows his actual name its just because in the files gmans files is  called "G_Man") So Gman leaves and Gordan gets teleported to where he was. I dont remember mutch more. But this is just a feedback not an entire story. So i rate 10/10 Because the storyline and characters and weapons are all just perfect im sure you should igve this game a try. But i suggest trying playing the demo. If you like the demo you should buy the game :) It is worth the money. There is a mod too called "Synergy" This mod lets you play Half life online..Any kinda half life game and is 100% free as long as you have atleats one hl game..You will only be able to play the HL Games in synergy you ahve already bought You need Atleast one of the HL Games from the series to actually play Synergy You can chose from Half life 2, Half Life 2 ep 1, Half Life 2 ep 2 Thats all i know you can use but yeah i suggest you play this game. I really enjoyed this game. And im sure you're gonna enjoy it too! Here is the link for synergy download store.steampowered.com/app/17520/ rememebr it is absolutely free as long as you have bought atleats one of these games Half Life 2, Half life 2 ep 1, Half Life 2 ep 2 if you havent you will not be able to play Half Life 2 online

Half-Life 2 - шедевр игровой индустрии. Живая легенда, эпос и в конце концов просто отличная игра. Не гнушитесь потратить 250 рублей. Поверьте, цена себя оправдывает. Сама игра не требует от игрока никаких особых навыков, кроме объективного мышления и немного логики. В целом проблем при прохождении возникать не должно. Физика в игре присутствует, а иногда ее придётся использовать.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
+ Игра-легенда.
+ Физика.
+ Реализм.
+ Сюжет.
+ Простота.

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
Отсутствуют.

[h1]Итого: 100/100[/h1]

[h1]Half Life 2 : [/h1]
Que dire de ce jeu qui a eu un énorme succès lors de sa sortie sur pc. Développer par valve, Half Life 2 est très addictif par son histoire qui est vraiment géniale. Le moteurs source plutôt vieux nous donne quand même un jeu qui a très bien vieillis alors qu’il est sorti en 2004. Un point négatif, les temps de chargement du au moteur source comme cité précédemment qui sont parfois agacent même s’ils sont assez rapide. Je vous conseille les deux épisodes suivant qui raconterons la suite de cette fameuse histoire...
